action_output:
Reason: To start a timer countdown in the Clock app, we first need to open the Clock app. On this screen, we do not see the Clock app icon, so the best approach is to open it directly by its name.
Action: {"action_type": "open_app", "app_name": "Clock"}
action_reason: To start a timer countdown in the Clock app, we first need to open the Clock app. On this screen, we do not see the Clock app icon, so the best approach is to open it directly by its name.
summary: Action selected: {"action_type": "open_app", "app_name": "Clock"}. Opened the Clock app to access timer options, next should locate and select "Timer" tab for countdown setup.
